# Indian Data Project

> Open Indian government data made accessible, visual, and shareable. Dense PDFs and buried spreadsheets turned into interactive visual stories.

## What this site does

Indian Data Project is a hub for Indian government data visualization. Each data domain gets its own visual story with explorable breakdowns. Eight domains are live: Union Budget 2025-26, Economic Survey 2025-26, RBI Data, State Finances, Census & Demographics, Education, Employment, and Healthcare.

## Pages

### Hub
- / — Visual portal showcasing all data domains with live stats from each dataset

### Budget Domain
- /budget — Scrollytelling narrative (9 sections): animated headline, revenue waffle chart, deficit rupee bar, 20-year budget trends (expenditure vs receipts + deficit % GDP), budget vs actual deviation chart (10 ministries), expenditure treemap, Sankey money flow, state choropleth, per-capita breakdown
- /budget/explore — Sortable ministry-wise expenditure table with expandable scheme detail. CSV export available.
- /budget/calculator — Personal tax calculator (FY 2025-26). Enter income, choose Old/New regime with deductions support (80C, 80D, HRA, 24b, NPS, 80TTA), see slab-by-slab tax breakdown and ministry-wise allocation of your tax. Shareable image card.
- /budget/methodology — Data sources, tax computation methodology, formatting conventions, limitations.
- /budget/glossary — Plain-language definitions of budget terms: fiscal deficit, revenue deficit, capital expenditure, cess, surcharge, devolution, FRBM, GDP, crore/lakh.

### Economy Domain
- /economy — Scrollytelling visual breakdown: GDP growth trend (line chart), inflation tracking (CPI/WPI line chart), trade balance (area chart), fiscal position, sectoral composition (horizontal bar chart with annotations)
- /economy/explore — Searchable table of all economic indicators with year-over-year comparisons
- /economy/methodology — Data sources, indicator definitions, survey methodology, limitations
- /economy/glossary — Plain-language definitions of economic terms: GDP, inflation, CPI, WPI, trade deficit, current account, FDI, sectoral composition, base year, advance estimates.

### RBI Data Domain
- /rbi — Scrollytelling narrative: repo rate hero, monetary policy trajectory (line chart), inflation targeting vs 4% mandate (line chart with band), M3 money supply growth, credit expansion (two-series line chart), forex reserves (area chart), exchange rate INR/USD
- /rbi/explore — Browseable indicator explorer with categories: monetary, liquidity, credit, external. Select any indicator to see full time series.
- /rbi/methodology — Data sources (RBI DBIE, World Bank, MPC press releases), indicator definitions, WB codes, data freshness, limitations
- /rbi/glossary — Plain-language definitions of RBI terms: repo rate, CRR, SLR, MPC, monetary policy stance, inflation targeting, M3 money supply, forex reserves, basis points.

### State Finances Domain
- /states — Scrollytelling narrative: state GSDP landscape (horizontal bar chart), growth leaders, revenue self-sufficiency (stacked bars showing own tax vs central transfers), fiscal health (debt-to-GSDP with FRBM 3% reference line), per capita GSDP
- /states/explore — Browseable indicator explorer with categories: GSDP, Revenue, Fiscal, Per Capita. Select any indicator to compare across all 31 states/UTs with data.
- /states/methodology — Data sources (RBI Handbook, State Finances report, Finance Commission), indicator definitions, data freshness (FY 2022-23 vintage), limitations
- /states/glossary — Plain-language definitions of state finance terms: GSDP, per capita income, own tax revenue, central transfers, devolution, FRBM Act, fiscal deficit, debt-to-GSDP, Finance Commission, self-sufficiency ratio.

### Census & Demographics Domain
- /census — Scrollytelling narrative: population growth (1.45 billion), age structure waffle chart (young/working/elderly), vital statistics (birth rate, death rate, fertility rate, life expectancy), infant mortality with state breakdown, literacy gender gap butterfly chart, urbanization trends
- /census/explore — Browseable indicator explorer with categories: Population, Demographics, Literacy, Health. Select any indicator to compare across states.
- /census/methodology — Data sources (Census of India 2011, World Bank API, NFHS-5, SRS 2023, NPC Projections), multi-vintage data strategy, indicator definitions, limitations
- /census/glossary — Plain-language definitions of demographic terms: census, decadal growth, sex ratio, dependency ratio, infant mortality rate, total fertility rate, literacy rate, urbanization, NFHS, SRS.

### Education Domain
- /education — Scrollytelling narrative: enrollment triumph (primary/secondary/tertiary GER trends), gender convergence in enrollment, dropout cliff (primary 1.9% → secondary 14.1%), learning quality gap (ASER outcomes), teacher challenge (pupil-teacher ratios), education spending vs global peers
- /education/explore — Browseable indicator explorer with categories: enrollment, quality, infrastructure, spending. Select any indicator to compare across 36 states.
- /education/methodology — Data sources (UDISE+ 2023-24, ASER 2024, World Bank), indicator definitions, limitations
- /education/glossary — Plain-language definitions of education terms: GER, NER, dropout rate, PTR, ASER, UDISE, NEP 2020, foundational literacy, RTE Act, and more.

### Employment Domain
- /employment — Scrollytelling narrative: participation puzzle (LFPR trends), structural shift (agriculture declining, services rising), youth unemployment crisis (3-4x overall rate), gender gap in LFPR, informality challenge (self-employment dominance), rural vs urban employment patterns
- /employment/explore — Browseable indicator explorer with categories: unemployment, participation, sectoral, informality. Select any indicator to compare across states.
- /employment/methodology — Data sources (PLFS 2023-24, World Bank, RBI KLEMS), indicator definitions, limitations
- /employment/glossary — Plain-language definitions of employment terms: LFPR, unemployment rate, PLFS, informal sector, gig economy, structural transformation, and more.

### Healthcare Domain
- /healthcare — Scrollytelling narrative: infrastructure deficit (0.5 hospital beds per 1,000 vs WHO 3.5), health spending (3.3% GDP), out-of-pocket burden (48% of health spending), immunization coverage, disease burden (TB, NCDs), doctor gap across states
- /healthcare/explore — Browseable indicator explorer with categories: infrastructure, spending, immunization, disease. Select any indicator to compare across states.
- /healthcare/methodology — Data sources (NHP 2022, NFHS-5, World Bank), indicator definitions, limitations
- /healthcare/glossary — Plain-language definitions of healthcare terms: PHC, CHC, out-of-pocket spending, immunization, TB incidence, hospital beds per 1000, and more.

## Key data points

### Budget (Budget Estimate 2025-26)
- Total expenditure: Rs 50,65,345 crore
- Revenue receipts: Rs 34,20,905 crore
- Capital expenditure: Rs 11,21,059 crore
- Fiscal deficit target: 4.4% of GDP
- Population estimate used: 145 crore (1.45 billion)

### Economic Survey (2025-26)
- Real GDP growth: 6.5% (2024-25 Provisional Estimate)
- Projected growth: 7.4% (2025-26 NSO First Advance Estimate, Jan 2026)
- CPI inflation: 4.0% (Economic Survey revised projection)
- Nominal GDP: Rs 3,56,98,000 crore
- Current account deficit: -0.8% of GDP (H1 FY2025-26)
- Per capita GDP: Rs 2,44,507

### RBI Data (2025-26)
- Repo rate: 5.25% (Neutral stance, as of February 6, 2026)
- CRR: 3.00%, SLR: 18.00%
- CPI inflation (World Bank latest): 4.95%
- Forex reserves: $643 billion (World Bank latest; RBI weekly: $724B as of Feb 2026)
- Broad money (M3) growth: 11.3%
- Exchange rate: ~83.67 INR per USD (FY2024-25 annual average)
- 30 repo rate decisions tracked from 2014 onward

### State Finances (FY 2022-23)
- Top GSDP: Maharashtra Rs 35.28 lakh crore
- National combined state GDP: Rs 280.73 lakh crore
- Growth range: 2.9% to 25.4% (constant prices)
- 31 states/UTs with data (5 small UTs have incomplete accounts)
- Average per capita GSDP: Rs 1,71,687
- Data source: RBI Handbook of Statistics on Indian States

### Census & Demographics
- Total population: ~1.45 billion (World Bank 2024 estimate)
- Population growth rate: ~0.8% (decelerating from 1.6% in 2001)
- Literacy rate: 74.04% (Census 2011; male 82.14%, female 65.46%)
- Sex ratio: 943 females per 1000 males (Census 2011)
- Total fertility rate: 2.0 (NFHS-5 2019-21, below replacement level of 2.1)
- Infant mortality rate: 28 per 1000 live births (SRS 2023)
- Life expectancy: 70.19 years (World Bank 2023)
- Urbanization: ~36% (World Bank 2023)
- Data sources: Census of India 2011, World Bank Open Data, NFHS-5, SRS 2023, National Population Commission

### Education
- Total students: 248.2 million (UDISE+ 2023-24)
- Total schools: 1.47 million
- GER Primary: 104.8%, Secondary: 79.6%, Tertiary: 28.4%
- Pupil-teacher ratio: 26 (national average)
- Education spending: 4.1% of GDP (NEP 2020 target: 6%)
- Data sources: UDISE+ 2023-24, ASER 2024, World Bank Open Data

### Employment
- Unemployment rate: 4.2% (PLFS Oct-Dec 2025)
- Labour force participation rate: 55.8%
- Female LFPR: 35.2%, Youth unemployment: 12.8%
- Agricultural employment: declining from 60% (2000) to 42% (2023)
- Services employment: rising from 23% (2000) to 32% (2023)
- Data sources: PLFS Quarterly Bulletin, PLFS Annual Report 2023-24, World Bank, RBI KLEMS

### Healthcare
- Hospital beds: 0.5 per 1,000 (WHO recommends 3.5)
- Physicians: 0.7 per 1,000
- Health expenditure: 3.3% of GDP (global average ~6%)
- Out-of-pocket spending: 48.2% of total health expenditure
- DPT immunization: 91%, Measles: 92%
- TB incidence: 199 per 100,000 (highest global burden)
- Data sources: NHP 2022 (CBHI), NFHS-5, World Bank Open Data

## Data sources

- Open Budgets India (openbudgetsindia.org) — structured budget data
- Union Budget documents (indiabudget.gov.in) — Expenditure Budget Vol. 1 & 2, Receipt Budget, Finance Bill
- Economic Survey of India (indiabudget.gov.in/economicsurvey/) — annual economic review
- Census projections and RBI reports for population estimates
- RBI DBIE (data.rbi.org.in) — Database on Indian Economy
- RBI Monetary Policy Statements — repo rate decisions, stance changes
- World Bank Open Data API — monetary, liquidity, credit, and external indicators
- RBI Handbook of Statistics on Indian States — state-level GSDP, per capita, growth rates
- RBI State Finances: A Study of Budgets — revenue composition, fiscal deficit, debt
- Finance Commission of India — tax devolution formulas, grants
- Census of India (censusindia.gov.in) — decennial census 2011 baseline population, literacy, urbanization
- National Family Health Survey (NFHS-5, 2019-21) — TFR, IMR, stunting, wasting, immunization by state
- Sample Registration System (SRS 2023) — birth rate, death rate, IMR annual estimates
- National Population Commission — population projections 2011-2036
- UDISE+ Flash Statistics 2023-24 (udiseplus.gov.in) — school enrollment, infrastructure, teacher data
- ASER 2024 (asercentre.org) — learning outcomes and foundational skills assessment
- PLFS Quarterly Bulletin (mospi.gov.in) — unemployment, LFPR, worker population ratio
- PLFS Annual Report 2023-24 — state-wise employment indicators
- RBI KLEMS Database — sectoral employment and output data
- National Health Profile 2022 (cbhidghs.mohfw.gov.in) — hospital infrastructure, PHCs, CHCs, doctors
- NFHS-5 (rchiips.org/nfhs) — immunization coverage, health indicators by state

## Downloadable datasets (JSON)

### Budget
- /data/budget/2025-26/summary.json — Budget headline numbers
- /data/budget/2025-26/receipts.json — Revenue breakdown by category
- /data/budget/2025-26/expenditure.json — Ministry-wise expenditure with sub-schemes
- /data/budget/2025-26/sankey.json — Revenue-to-expenditure flow data
- /data/budget/2025-26/statewise.json — State-wise budget allocation
- /data/budget/2025-26/schemes.json — Major government schemes
- /data/budget/2025-26/treemap.json — Hierarchical expenditure data
- /data/budget/2025-26/trends.json — 20-year historical budget trends (FY 2005-06 to 2025-26): expenditure, receipts, fiscal deficit, fiscal deficit % GDP, revenue deficit % GDP
- /data/budget/2025-26/budget-vs-actual.json — Ministry-level Budget Estimate vs Revised Estimate vs Actual for 10 top ministries across 7 fiscal years (FY 2019-20 to 2025-26)
- /data/tax-calculator/slabs.json — Income tax slab rates (Old and New regime)
- /data/tax-calculator/expenditure-shares.json — Ministry spending shares for tax allocation

### Economy
- /data/economy/2025-26/summary.json — Economic headline numbers
- /data/economy/2025-26/gdp-growth.json — GDP growth time series
- /data/economy/2025-26/inflation.json — CPI and WPI inflation data
- /data/economy/2025-26/fiscal.json — Fiscal deficit and government finances
- /data/economy/2025-26/external.json — Trade balance, exports, imports
- /data/economy/2025-26/sectors.json — Sectoral GDP composition
- /data/economy/2025-26/indicators.json — Key economic indicators

### RBI
- /data/rbi/2025-26/summary.json — RBI headline numbers (repo rate, stance, forex, M3)
- /data/rbi/2025-26/monetary-policy.json — Repo rate decision history, CRR time series
- /data/rbi/2025-26/liquidity.json — Broad money growth and M3 % GDP
- /data/rbi/2025-26/credit.json — Domestic and private credit, lending/deposit rates
- /data/rbi/2025-26/forex.json — Forex reserves and INR/USD exchange rate
- /data/rbi/2025-26/indicators.json — All RBI indicators across 4 categories

### State Finances
- /data/states/2025-26/summary.json — State finances headline numbers
- /data/states/2025-26/gsdp.json — State-wise GSDP, growth rate, per capita + 3-year GSDP history for top 10 states
- /data/states/2025-26/revenue.json — Own tax revenue, central transfers, self-sufficiency ratio
- /data/states/2025-26/fiscal-health.json — Fiscal deficit and debt-to-GSDP by state
- /data/states/2025-26/indicators.json — All state indicators across 4 categories

### Census & Demographics
- /data/census/2025-26/summary.json — Census headline numbers (population, literacy, sex ratio)
- /data/census/2025-26/population.json — State-wise population, density, urban/rural split, decadal growth, national time series
- /data/census/2025-26/demographics.json — Age structure (young/working/elderly %), dependency ratio, vital stats (birth/death/fertility/life expectancy), urbanization trend
- /data/census/2025-26/literacy.json — State-wise literacy by gender, national time series
- /data/census/2025-26/health.json — IMR time series, state-level IMR, NFHS-5 state health (TFR, IMR, U5MR, stunting, wasting, immunization)
- /data/census/2025-26/indicators.json — All census indicators across 4 categories

### Education
- /data/education/2025-26/summary.json — Education headline numbers (total students, GER, PTR, spending)
- /data/education/2025-26/enrollment.json — National enrollment time series + state GER
- /data/education/2025-26/quality.json — Pupil-teacher ratios, learning outcomes, school infrastructure
- /data/education/2025-26/spending.json — Education expenditure trends (% GDP, % govt spending)
- /data/education/2025-26/indicators.json — All education indicators across 4 categories

### Employment
- /data/employment/2025-26/summary.json — Employment headline numbers (UR, LFPR, female LFPR)
- /data/employment/2025-26/unemployment.json — Unemployment time series (total/youth/gender) + state data
- /data/employment/2025-26/participation.json — LFPR time series (total/male/female) + state data
- /data/employment/2025-26/sectoral.json — Agriculture/industry/services employment shares
- /data/employment/2025-26/indicators.json — All employment indicators across 4 categories

### Healthcare
- /data/healthcare/2025-26/summary.json — Healthcare headline numbers (beds, doctors, spending, OOP)
- /data/healthcare/2025-26/infrastructure.json — Hospital beds, physicians, nurses time series + state data
- /data/healthcare/2025-26/spending.json — Health expenditure trends (% GDP, per capita, OOP)
- /data/healthcare/2025-26/disease.json — TB incidence, immunization coverage trends
- /data/healthcare/2025-26/indicators.json — All healthcare indicators across 4 categories

## Tax calculator details

Supports both Old and New tax regimes for AY 2026-27 (FY 2025-26):
- Standard deduction: Rs 75,000 (New) / Rs 50,000 (Old)
- Old Regime deductions: Section 80C (Rs 1.5L cap), 80D health insurance (Rs 25K self + Rs 25K parents), 80CCD(1B) NPS (Rs 50K), Section 24(b) home loan interest (Rs 2L), HRA exemption, 80TTA savings interest (Rs 10K)
- Quick presets: "Salaried basics", "With home loan", "Max deductions"
- Section 87A rebate applied
- Surcharge slabs for high incomes
- 4% Health and Education Cess
